bmi160_regmap¶

robot.commands.imu.bmi160_regmap

Author: Matthew Wnuk Business: None of Yours Incorporated Date Modified: Feb 2018 Discription: Register Map for BMI_160 IMU

Notes:

Default register values do not seem to match the stated values (this may be a function of configuration by the Intel-Aero RTF in which I am accessing the sensor), and LSBs of ‘MAG_CONF’ are listed as contents of ‘GYR_RANGE’ register

Page numbers refer to Data Sheet DS000-07-786474

Module attributes

STEP_CONF

magnetometer is accesses via indirect addressing using MAG_IF(5 bytes) register MAG_IF_0 = [0b0010-0000] #I2C device address for bmi150 magnetometer MAG_IF_1 = [0b1000-0000] = [manual_en(7), reserved, mag_offset(5:2), mag_rd_burst(1:0) MAG_IF_2 = BMI150 register to read MAG_IF_3 = BMI150 register to write to MAG_IF_4 = Data to write to BMI150

Previous topic

bmi150_regmap

Next topic

robot.commands.imu.bmi160_regmap.STEP_CONF
